Package.Name: XML_sql2xml
Package.Summary: This class takes a PEAR::DB-Result Object, a sql-query-string, an array and/or an xml-string/file and returns a xml-representation of it.

Release.Notes: New Features: - Adding of XML-files/strings is possible - works with 4.0.6 and below - setOption can delete values set before. - Added possibility of other input encoding schemes than iso-8859-1 - print_empty_ids is true by default - added new useroption "TableNameForRowTags" - user_option selected_id can take the arguments first and all BugFixes - sql selects are recognized with capitals as well - if there was a < in the database it gave an xml-error, now "< " is "escaped"
